input.sentences: abandoned or empty buildings and lots can have things of interest hidden .
a chair that seems as if the sitter was preparing something sits alone .
trinkets and things almost form something like a sculpture .
a sign warns its readers of hidden dangers .
despite its hidden secrets | some areas sit vacant and void .
output.sentences: I've always thought the lots behind my house were empty but I was surprised to find some unique hidden treasures.
My first find was an old chair and speakers which were set up so I could easily imagine a sitter in it preparing to play a guitar as he sits in a crowded bar.
I then found some random trinkets and while they weren't much to look at I thought I could form them into some type of sculpture.

The best thing I found that day was a sign that warns "eyes cannot be replaced", but I thought if the readers of this sign already had no eyes they wouldn't be able to read the warning and for them it wouldn't be a warning as much as it would be a disappointing realization.
I've already planned another exploration at an abandoned building most people probably think sit void and vacant, but after today I know better.
